The lenses could have a built-in touchscreen display, allowing you to check your notifications, browse the internet, or watch videos without having to physically handle your devices. This would be perfect for people who are always on the go and want to stay connected without having to constantly pull out their phone.

This would be perfect for people who love to listen to music or audiobooks while they're on the go, without having to worry about tangled cords or losing their device.
